projects.title: Stock Market Web and iOS Application
projects.overview: Developed a stock market application utilizing the MERN stack for the web version and Swift for iOS.
extras: Built a native iOS app with Swift using MVVM architecture
Deployed scalable backend on AWS Lambda

videos.caption: Responsive UI showcasing the adaptability of the stock market web app.
Stock market web application displaying real-time financial data.
Mobile version of the stock market app built using SwiftUI.

projects.title: Waste Classification using Transfer Learning
projects.overview: Developed a CNN-based deep learning model to classify waste into six categories: cardboard, glass, metal, organic, paper, and plastic.
applications: Automated waste classification for recycling centers
Reduction in manual labor for waste sorting
extras: Dataset augmentation to improve model generalization

images.caption: ResNet50v2 architecture used for waste classification.
Graph depicting the testing accuracy and loss during model training.
Inference results on test dataset for waste classification.
Performance metrics comparing classification accuracy for different waste types.
Confusion matrix illustrating model accuracy for each waste category.

projects.title: OCR for Medical Reports: Enhanced Data Extraction and Summarization
projects.overview: This project aims to enhance data extraction and summarization of medical reports using OCR technology and machine learning.
extras: Developed a Medical Dictionary in collaboration with local doctors
Combined information extraction and summarization for better comprehension

images.caption: Workflow diagram illustrating OCR processing steps for medical reports.
Example of a raw medical report before OCR processing.
Extracted textual data from the medical report using AWS Textract.
Highlighted abnormal parameters identified from the extracted text.
